Live Graphs

Jake Vestal, with thanks to Duncan Murdoch

Source: vignettes/Live Graphs.Rmd
Live Graphs.Rmd

dygraphs Candlestick Plot

suppressMessages(library(xts))
data(sample_matrix)
tail(sample_matrix, n = 32) %>%
  dygraphs::dygraph() %>%
  dygraphs::dyCandlestick()

plotly 3D Surface Plot

suppressMessages(library())
# volcano is a numeric matrix that ships with R
plotly::plot_ly(z = ~volcano) %>%
  plotly::add_surface()

RGL Plot of a Regression Plane through 3D Scatter Data

# Show regression plane with z as dependent variable
library(rgl)
open3d()
## null 
##    4
x <- rnorm(100)
y <- rnorm(100)
z <- 0.2*x - 0.3*y + rnorm(100, sd = 0.3)
fit <- lm(z ~ x + y)

plot3d(x, y, z, type = "s", col = "red", size = 1)

# No plot here, because of the planes3d() call below

coefs <- coef(fit)
a <- coefs["x"]
b <- coefs["y"]
c <- -1
d <- coefs["(Intercept)"]
planes3d(a, b, c, d, alpha = 0.5)

For more on RGL, see the package site here.

Leaflet

suppressMessages(library(leaflet))
m <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%  # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
  addMarkers(lng=174.768, lat=-36.852, popup="The birthplace of R")
m  # Print the map
